name: Uncommon
description: The next shop will have a free Uncommon Joker.

name: Rare
description: The next shop will have a free Rare Joker.

name: Negative
description: The next base edition Joker you find in a Shop becomes Negative (+1 joker slot) and free.

name: Foil
description: The next base edition Joker you find in a Shop becomes Foil (+50 Chips) and free.

name: Coupon
description: In the next shop, initial Jokers, Consumables Cards and Booster Packs are free ($0).

name: Double
description: Gives a copy of the next Tag selected (excluding Double Tags).

name: Holographic
description: The next base edition Joker you find in a Shop becomes Holographic (+10 Mult) and free.

name: Polychrome
description: The next base edition Joker you find in a Shop becomes Polychrome (X1.5 Mult) and free.

name: Investment
description: Gain $25 after defeating the next Boss Blind.

name: Voucher
description: Adds a Voucher to the next Shop.

name: Top Up
description: Create up to 2 Common Jokers (if you have space).

name: Juggle
description: +3 Hand Size for the next round only.

name: Boss
description: Re-rolls the next Boss Blind.

name: Standard
description: Immediately open a free Mega Standard Pack.

name: Charm
description: Immediately open a free Mega Arcana Pack.

name: Meteor
description: Immediately open a free Mega Celestial Pack.

name: Buffoon
description: Immediately open a free Mega Buffoon Pack.

name: Orbital
description: Upgrades a specified random Poker Hand by three levels.

name: Speed
description: Gives $5 for each Blind you've skipped this run.

name: Handy
description: Gain $1 for each hand played this run.

name: Garbage
description: Gain $1 for each unused discard this run.

name: Ethereal
description: Immediately open a free Spectral Pack.

name: Economy
description: Doubles your money (adds a maximum of $40).

name: D6
description: Gives $5 for each Blind you've skipped this run.
